I am a Master of Public Health student at the [Tufts University School of Medicine](https://medicine.tufts.edu/) focusing in epidemiology and biostatistics. My academic background is an Honours Bachelor of Science degree in mathematics, with a double-minor in biology and English from the [University of Toronto](https://www.utoronto.ca/). I was born and raised in Ottawa, Canada. I moved to Toronto for my undergraduate degree, and am now living in Boston.
